tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nlp_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    data_text TEXT,
    data_label VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES nlp_models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NLP_Models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    model_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_description TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Model_Results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    trigger_id INT,
    result_value FLOAT,
    result_category VARCHAR(50),
    result_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES NLP_Models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trigger_id) REFERENCES Model_Triggers(trigger_id)
);

CREATE TABLE model (    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,    model_description TEXT,    model_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    model_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,    model_created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,    model_updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE parameter (    parameter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    model_id UUID REFERENCES model(model_id),    parameter_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,    parameter_value TEXT NOT NULL,    parameter_created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,    parameter_updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE training_data (    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    model_id UUID REFERENCES model(model_id),    data_file_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,    data_uploaded_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE evaluation (    evaluation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    model_id UUID REFERENCES model(model_id),    evaluation_metric VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    evaluation_value FLOAT NOT NULL,    evaluation_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE prediction (    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    model_id UUID REFERENCES model(model_id),    prediction_text TEXT NOT NULL,    prediction_result TEXT NOT NULL,    prediction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
